ygData.from: "Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: Question about crafted weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Wood elven blacksmiths can craft Mithril Fier dal weapons.  These items are deity items linked to Tunare.  My bard is a wood elf but I chose Bristlebane since
ygData.messageBody:
Wood elven blacksmiths can craft Mithril Fier'dal weapons. These items are
deity items linked to Tunare. My bard is a wood elf but I chose Bristlebane
since I figured the god of rogues was more fitting for a bard than Tunare.
So does that mean I can not equip these weapons since I don't worship
Tunare? And if I can't equip weapons crafted by wood elves, could I equip
deity weapons crafted by halflings who worship Bristlebane?

Thanks
Galtin of E'ci


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
